choices.answer: Sharia should work in a quiet place where she will be able to concentrate.
Sharia should go over to pet her dog, and take him for a walk.
Sharia should join her brother and make TikTok videos.
Sharia should stop virtual school and go watch TV.

questions.question: Sharia's workspace is in the kitchen where her brother dances to TikToks ,the dog barks loudly, and the TV is blaring.
Marwa has missed the first few moments of virtual class because she woke up late this morning.

choices.answer: Marwa should enter the virtual class late and yell that she's present!
Marwa should set her alarm and arrive to her classes a few moments early.
Marwa should continue to be late for class and miss important info.
Marwa should just not attend her class since she's late anyway.

imageMetadata.altText: Portrait of tardy young man wears blue bathrobe holding cup of coffe and yawning unable to wake up in time to get to work, isolated on white background.

questions.question: Phil is confused, and has a question about what his teacher was discussing with the class.

choices.answer: Phil should interupt his teacher and ask his question.
Phil should type "I don't understand" in the chatbox.
Phil should use the raise hand feature in TEAMS and wait to be called on.
Phil should just be quiet and not ask his question.

questions.question: A student brings up a really good point during class discussion. You have something to add to that point.

choices.answer: You should keep your comment to yourself.
You should disrupt your class mate because your point is more important.
You should add GIFS in the chatbox to distract the rest of the class.
You should comment in the chatbox or raise your hand to speak next.

imageMetadata.altText: Hand draw question marks with young woman

choices.answer: Meghan should use the raise hand feature and wait to unmute her mic.
Never mute your mic and speak when you want.
Play loud music while your mic is unmuted.
Talk to your sibling in the background while your mic is unmuted.

questions.question: Ms. Dimaggio is presenting a power point to her peers, and Meghan has a question to ask about the presentation.

questions.question: Kendra had an amazing weekend, and she can't wait to tell her classmates all about it in the TEAMS chat box.

choices.answer: Kendra should post GIFs in the chatbox to make her friends laught.
Kendra should be professional, and stay on topic in the chat box.
Kendra should blurt out during instruction that her weekend was LIT!
Kendra should texts her friends during virtual class about her weekend.
Melinda should think fast and cover the mess with a blanket.
Melinda should turn her camera off.
Melinda should use a background filter in TEAMS while her camera is on.
Melinda should not attend class because her workspace is untidy.

questions.question: Melinda forgot to clean her bedroom/workspace before logging in to virtual school.

choices.answer: Mark should take a nap.
Mark should walk away from the screen while his teacher speaks.
Mark should sit up straight, and be fully engaged while his teacher speaks.
Mark should turn off his camera.

questions.question: Mark's teacher is going over a power point now, so he wants to take a nap/break while the teacher is presenting.
